text:
Justin Theroux and Jennifer Aniston announced their separation in February after two years of marriage. Alberto E. Rodriguez/Getty Images

2018 has been marked by new celebrity couples — like Chris Pratt and Katherine Schwarzenegger and Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas— but it's also been quite the year for splits. Some pairs were together for a few months before calling it quits, while others were together for more than 10 years.

From movie stars to reality TV stars, keep reading to see which celebrity couples split.
title: All the celebrity couples that broke up in 2018
